name: Plantasyon Kafé
description:
All GFX are pixellated, cropped and revisited version of photos from unsplash.com

BGM is a mix of 2 tracks from freesound.org

Voice acting, well, if you have played spysonous, you recognized my voice ;-)

Made in between 3h and 3h30, maybe less, maybe more. I was a lot disrupted during this jam and couldn't track time properly. I can only say for GFX and BGM which took less than 30 minutes altogether. Hence, I'm not sure of bugs.
